Plot: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.
Title: The Fourth Kind
Writer: Olatunde Osunsanmi (screenplay), Olatunde Osunsanmi (story), Terry Robbins (story)
Actors: Milla Jovovich, Will Patton, Hakeem Kae-Kazim, Corey Johnson
tomatoConsensus: While it boasts a handful of shocks, The Fourth Kind is hokey and clumsy and makes its close encounters seem eerily mundane.
